name: Cultist Meditation
body:
### Welcome to Cultist Meditation. Venture down into the [dungeon] to fulfill the [ritual] of your dreams with [guidance] of the meditating cultists (twitch crowd)!
[http://www.twitch.tv/cultistmeditationbot](http://www.twitch.tv/cultistmeditationbot) ### Global Game Jam 2016 (Finnish GJ, Oulu) [Crafted](http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/cultist-meditation-finnish-game-jam-2016-twitch-plays-roguelike) in Unity in one hectic 48h marathon! Based on [diversifiers](http://globalgamejam.org/news/ggj16-diversifiers-are): * Twitch Plays (& Crowd sourced) * LEGO Got It Right * One hand tied behind my back * Story Mode ### Authors and Contributors (Code) @Zaelot @domestus @stcl
(Music) Pasi 'Smil' Tervonen & Aki Sirni√∂ ### Inspiration from the idea by @ikaikkon
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
